original_title: Schiff launches legal defense fund in response to Trump admin | Fox News
article_summary: Sen. Adam Schiff launches legal defense fund amid federal investigation for alleged mortgage fraud and ongoing criticism from President Trump, who accuses Schiff of promoting the "Russiagate" hoax and leaking classified information. Trump's allies, including White House spokesman Harrison Fields, label Schiff as a "fraud" and "corrupt politician."</s>
